description: Component catalog for UX Engineer agent. Maps every available component to its library, description, and category.

accordion.desc: Collapsible content sections with animated open/close.

alert-dialog.desc: Modal dialog for confirmations and destructive actions.

alert.desc: Callout banner for important messages (info, warning, error).

aspect-ratio.desc: Maintains a fixed aspect ratio for images and media.

avatar.desc: Circular user avatar with image fallback to initials.

badge.desc: Small label for status, counts, or categories.

breadcrumb.desc: Hierarchical navigation trail showing current page location.

button.desc: Standard button with variants: default, destructive, outline, ghost, link.

card.desc: Container with header, content, and footer sections.

carousel.desc: Horizontal content slider with prev/next navigation.

chart.desc: Data visualization wrapper for charts and graphs.

checkbox.desc: Toggle checkbox input with label support.

context-menu.desc: Right-click context menu with nested items.

dialog.desc: Modal overlay dialog with header, body, footer.

drawer.desc: Slide-in panel from edge of screen.

dropdown-menu.desc: Dropdown menu triggered by a button.

form.desc: Form wrapper with validation and field state management.

hover-card.desc: Floating card that appears on hover over a trigger.

input-otp.desc: One-time password input with individual digit slots.

label.desc: Form label linked to an input element.

menubar.desc: Horizontal menu bar with dropdown submenus.

pagination.desc: Page navigation with prev/next and page numbers.

popover.desc: Floating popover panel anchored to a trigger element.

radio-group.desc: Radio button group for single-selection options.

resizable.desc: Resizable split pane layout with drag handles.

scroll-area.desc: Custom scrollbar container with overflow handling.

select.desc: Dropdown select input with searchable options.

sheet.desc: Slide-in side panel overlay (left, right, top, bottom).

slider.desc: Range slider input for selecting numeric values.

sonner.desc: Toast notification system with stacking and auto-dismiss.

switch.desc: Toggle switch for on/off boolean values.

table.desc: Data table with header, body, and row components.

tabs.desc: Tab navigation switching between content panels.

toggle-group.desc: Group of toggle buttons for multi-option selection.

toggle.desc: Pressable toggle button with on/off state.

tooltip.desc: Floating label that appears on hover with brief info.

3d-card.desc: Card with 3D perspective tilt effect that elevates elements on hover.

3d-globe.desc: Realistic interactive globe with tooltips and avatar tips.

3d-marquee.desc: 3D marquee grid effect, good for showcasing testimonials and hero sections.

3d-pin.desc: Gradient pin that animates on hover, perfect for product links.

animated-modal.desc: Customizable compound modal with animated transitions.

animated-testimonials.desc: Minimal testimonials section with image and quote animations.

animated-tooltip.desc: Tooltip that reveals on hover and follows mouse pointer.

apple-cards-carousel.desc: Sleek minimal carousel as seen on apple.com.

aurora-background.desc: Subtle aurora / southern lights background effect.

background-beams.desc: Multiple SVG beams following paths, good for hero backgrounds.

background-beams-with-collision.desc: Exploding beams in the background with collision effects.

background-boxes.desc: Full-width box container that highlights individual boxes on hover.

background-gradient.desc: Animated gradient sitting behind cards, buttons, or any element.

background-gradient-animation.desc: Smooth elegant gradient animation that shifts position over time.

background-lines.desc: SVG paths animating in wave pattern, good for hero backgrounds.

background-ripple-effect.desc: Grid of cells that ripple when clicked.

bento-grid.desc: Skewed grid layout with title, description, and header components.

canvas-reveal-effect.desc: Dot background that expands on hover, as seen on Clerk's website.

card-hover-effect.desc: Hover effect that slides highlight to the currently hovered card.

card-spotlight.desc: Card with spotlight revealing a radial gradient background.

card-stack.desc: Cards stacking on top of each other with interval, great for testimonials.

code-block.desc: Configurable code block with syntax highlighting.

colourful-text.desc: Text with various colour, filter, and scale effects.

comet-card.desc: Perspective 3D tilt card as seen on Perplexity Comet's website.

compare.desc: Comparison slider between two images, slide or drag to compare.

container-scroll-animation.desc: Scroll animation that rotates in 3D, perfect for hero/marketing sections.

container-text-flip.desc: Container that flips through words, animating the width.

cover.desc: Wraps children with beams and space effect, hover to reveal speed.

direction-aware-hover.desc: Direction-aware hover effect using Framer Motion.

draggable-card.desc: Tiltable, draggable card that jumps on bounds.

encrypted-text.desc: Text reveals gradually with a gibberish/decryption effect.

evervault-card.desc: Card with hover effect revealing encrypted text and mixed gradient.

file-upload.desc: Minimal file upload with drag-and-drop and micro interactions.

flip-words.desc: Component that flips through a list of words.

floating-dock.desc: macOS-style floating dock component acting as navigation bar.

floating-navbar.desc: Sticky navbar that hides on scroll down, reveals on scroll up.

focus-cards.desc: Hover to focus on a card, blurring the rest.

glare-card.desc: Glare effect on hover, as seen on Linear's website.

glowing-effect.desc: Border glowing effect adapting to any container, as seen on Cursor's site.

glowing-stars.desc: Card with background stars that animate on hover.

google-gemini-effect.desc: SVG animation effect as seen on the Google Gemini website.

grid.desc: Simple grid and dot backgrounds to make sections stand out.

hero-highlight.desc: Background effect with text highlight, perfect for hero sections.

hero-parallax.desc: Scroll effect with rotation, translation, and opacity animations.

hover-border-gradient.desc: Hover effect expanding gradient border across the container.

images-badge.desc: Badge with images that can be hovered to reveal more.

images-slider.desc: Full-page image slider navigable by keyboard.

infinite-moving-cards.desc: Cards moving infinitely in a loop, great for testimonials.

lamp.desc: Lamp light effect as seen on Linear, great for section headers.

layout-grid.desc: Layout effect animating grid items on click with Framer Motion.

layout-text-flip.desc: Text flip effect that changes the layout of surrounding text.

lens.desc: Lens component to zoom into images, videos, or anything.

link-preview.desc: Dynamic link previews for anchor tags on hover.

loader.desc: Simple minimal loaders for loading screens.

macbook-scroll.desc: Scroll animation where image comes out of screen, as seen on Fey.com.

meteors.desc: Background beams like meteors falling diagonally.

moving-border.desc: Animated border moving around the container, great for buttons.

multi-step-loader.desc: Step loader for screens that take time to load.

navbar-menu.desc: Navbar with animated children on hover, makes a beautiful bignav.

noise-background.desc: Dynamic background with animated gradients, noise texture, and smooth motion.

parallax-scroll.desc: Grid where two columns scroll in opposite directions for parallax effect.

pixelated-canvas.desc: Converts image to pixelated canvas with mouse distortion.

placeholders-and-vanish-input.desc: Sliding-in placeholders with vanish effect on submit.

pointer-highlight.desc: Highlights text in view with a pointer and border.

resizable-navbar.desc: Navbar that changes width on scroll, responsive and animated.

shooting-stars.desc: Shooting star animation on a starry background.

sidebar.desc: Expandable sidebar that expands on hover with dark mode support.

sparkles.desc: Configurable sparkles as background or standalone component.

spotlight.desc: Spotlight effect for drawing attention to an element on the page.

spotlight-new.desc: New spotlight component with left/right configurable spotlights.

stars-background.desc: Starry background with twinkling star effects.

stateful-button.desc: Button showing loading state on click, success when complete.

sticky-banner.desc: Banner that sticks to top, hides when scrolling down.

sticky-scroll-reveal.desc: Sticky container with text revealing on scroll.

svg-mask-effect.desc: Mask reveal effect: hover to reveal what's underneath.

tabs.desc: Animated tabs with background animation on switch.

text-generate-effect.desc: Text fading in word by word on page load.

text-hover-effect.desc: Text that animates and outlines gradient on hover.

text-reveal-card.desc: Mousemove effect revealing text content at card bottom.

timeline.desc: Timeline with sticky header and scroll beam follow.

tooltip-card.desc: Tooltip card container following mouse pointer on hover.

tracing-beam.desc: Beam following SVG path as user scrolls, adjusts with speed.

typewriter-effect.desc: Text generates as if being typed on screen.

vortex.desc: Wavy swirly vortex background ideal for CTAs.

wavy-background.desc: Cool background with animated moving waves.

wobble-card.desc: Card that translates and scales on mousemove, great for features.

world-map.desc: World map with animated lines and dots, programmatically generated.

ASCIIText.desc: Renders text with animated ASCII background for retro feel.

AnimatedContent.desc: Wrapper animating children on scroll/mount with configurable direction and easing.

AnimatedList.desc: List items enter with staggered motion variants for polished reveals.

Antigravity.desc: 3D antigravity particle field that repels from cursor with smooth motion.

Balatro.desc: The Balatro shader, fully customizable and interactive.

Ballpit.desc: Physics ball pit simulation with bouncing colorful spheres.

Beams.desc: Crossing animated ribbons with customizable properties.

BlobCursor.desc: Organic blob cursor that follows pointer with inertia and elastic morphing.

BlurText.desc: Text starts blurred then crisply resolves for a soft-focus reveal.

BubbleMenu.desc: Floating circular expanding menu with staggered item reveal.

CardNav.desc: Expandable navigation bar with card panels revealing nested links.

CardSwap.desc: Cards animate position swapping with smooth layout transitions.

Carousel.desc: Responsive carousel with touch gestures, looping and transitions.

ChromaGrid.desc: Responsive grid of grayscale tiles revealing colors on hover.

CircularText.desc: Characters laid around a circle with optional rotation animation.

ClickSpark.desc: Particle spark bursts at click position.

ColorBends.desc: Vibrant color bends with smooth flowing animation.

CountUp.desc: Animated number counter supporting formatting and decimals.

Counter.desc: Flexible animated counter with increments and easing.

Crosshair.desc: Custom crosshair cursor with tracking and link hover effects.

Cubes.desc: 3D rotating cube cluster supporting auto-rotation or hover.

CurvedLoop.desc: Flowing looping text path along customizable curve with drag.

DarkVeil.desc: Subtle dark background with smooth animation and postprocessing.

DecayCard.desc: Hover parallax effect that disintegrates card content.

DecryptedText.desc: Hacker-style decryption cycling random glyphs until resolving to text.

Dock.desc: macOS-style magnifying dock with proximity scaling of icons.

DomeGallery.desc: Immersive 3D dome gallery projecting images on hemispheric surface.

DotGrid.desc: Animated dot grid with cursor interactions.

ElasticSlider.desc: Slider handle stretches elastically then snaps with spring physics.

ElectricBorder.desc: Jittery electric energy border with animated arcs and glow.

FadeContent.desc: Directional fade/slide entrance wrapper with threshold activation.

FallingText.desc: Characters fall with gravity and bounce for playful entrance.

FaultyTerminal.desc: Terminal CRT scanline effect with flicker and noise.

FloatingLines.desc: 3D floating lines reacting to cursor movement.

FlowingMenu.desc: Liquid flowing active indicator gliding between menu items.

FluidGlass.desc: Glassmorphism container with animated liquid distortion refraction.

Folder.desc: Interactive folder opening to reveal nested content.

FuzzyText.desc: Vibrating fuzzy text with controllable hover intensity.

Galaxy.desc: Parallax realistic starfield with pointer interactions.

GhostCursor.desc: Semi-transparent ghost cursor trailing the real cursor.

GlareHover.desc: Realistic moving glare highlight on hover over any element.

GlassIcons.desc: Icon set styled with frosted glass blur.

GlassSurface.desc: Apple-style glass surface with real-time distortion and lighting.

GlitchText.desc: RGB split and distortion glitch effect with jitter.

GooeyNav.desc: Navigation with gooey blob transitions between items.

GradientBlinds.desc: Layered gradient blinds with spotlight and noise distortion.

GradientText.desc: Animated gradient sweep across text with speed and color control.

GradualBlur.desc: Progressively un-blurs content on scroll for cinematic reveal.

Grainient.desc: Grainy gradient swirls with soft wave distortion.

GridDistortion.desc: Warped grid mesh distorting smoothly reacting to cursor.

GridMotion.desc: Perspective moving grid lines based on cursor position.

GridScan.desc: Animated grid room 3D scan effect with interactions.

Hyperspeed.desc: Lines simulating hyperspace travel on click hold.

ImageTrail.desc: Cursor-based image trail with several built-in variants.

InfiniteMenu.desc: Horizontally looping menu scrolling endlessly with seamless wrap.

Iridescence.desc: Slick iridescent shader with shifting waves.

Lanyard.desc: Swinging 3D lanyard/badge card with realistic inertial motion.

LaserFlow.desc: Dynamic laser light flowing onto a surface.

LightPillar.desc: Vertical pillar of light with glow effects.

LightRays.desc: Volumetric light rays/beams with customizable direction.

Lightning.desc: Procedural lightning bolts with branching and glow flicker.

LiquidChrome.desc: Liquid metallic chrome shader with flowing reflective surface.

LiquidEther.desc: Interactive liquid shader with flowing distortion and customizable colors.

LogoLoop.desc: Continuously looping marquee of brand logos with hover pause.

MagicBento.desc: Interactive bento grid tiles expanding and animating.

Magnet.desc: Elements magnetically ease toward cursor then settle with spring physics.

MagnetLines.desc: Animated field lines bending toward the cursor.

Masonry.desc: Responsive masonry layout with animated reflow and gap optimization.

MetaBalls.desc: Liquid metaball blobs merging and separating with smooth animation.

MetallicPaint.desc: Liquid metallic paint shader applicable to SVG elements.

ModelViewer.desc: Three.js model viewer with orbit controls and lighting presets.

Noise.desc: Animated film grain/noise overlay adding subtle texture.

Orb.desc: Floating energy orb with customizable hover effect.

OrbitImages.desc: SVG path customizable orbiting images effect.

PillNav.desc: Minimal pill nav with sliding active highlight.

PixelBlast.desc: Exploding pixel particle bursts with optional liquid postprocessing.

PixelCard.desc: Card content revealed through pixel expansion transition.

PixelSnow.desc: Falling pixelated snow with customizable density and speed.

PixelTrail.desc: Pixelated cursor trail emitting fading squares with retro feel.

PixelTransition.desc: Pixel dissolve transition for content reveal on hover.

Plasma.desc: Organic plasma gradients swirling with smooth turbulence.

Prism.desc: Rotating prism with configurable intensity, size, and colors.

PrismaticBurst.desc: Burst of light rays with controllable color and distortion.

ProfileCard.desc: Animated profile card with 3D hover effect and glare.

ReflectiveCard.desc: Card with dynamic webcam reflection and glare responding to cursor.

Ribbons.desc: Flowing responsive ribbons driven by physics and pointer motion.

RippleGrid.desc: Grid continuously animating with a ripple effect.

RotatingText.desc: Cycles through phrases with 3D rotate/flip transitions.

ScrambledText.desc: Detects cursor position and applies distortion to text.

ScrollFloat.desc: Text gently floats/parallax shifts on scroll.

ScrollReveal.desc: Text gently unblurs and reveals on scroll.

ScrollStack.desc: Overlapping card stack revealing on scroll with depth layering.

ScrollVelocity.desc: Text marquee whose speed scales with user's scroll velocity.

ShapeBlur.desc: Morphing blurred geometric shape with hover effect.

ShinyText.desc: Metallic sheen sweeping across text producing reflective highlight.

Shuffle.desc: Animated text reveal where characters shuffle before settling.

Silk.desc: Smooth waves background with soft lighting.

SplashCursor.desc: Liquid splash burst at cursor with curling ripples and waves.

SplitText.desc: Splits text into characters/words for staggered entrance animation.

SpotlightCard.desc: Dynamic spotlight follows cursor casting gradient illumination.

Squares.desc: Animated squares with scaling and direction customization.

Stack.desc: Layered stack with swipe animations, autoplay, and smooth transitions.

StaggeredMenu.desc: Menu with staggered item animations on open/close.

StarBorder.desc: Animated sparkle border orbiting content with twinkle pulses.

Stepper.desc: Animated multi-step progress indicator with active state transitions.

StickerPeel.desc: Sticker corner lift and peel interaction with 3D transform.

TargetCursor.desc: Cursor follow animation with 4 corners locking onto targets.

TextCursor.desc: Text element follows cursor, leaving a trail of copies behind.

TextPressure.desc: Characters scale/warp interactively based on pointer pressure zone.

TextType.desc: Typewriter effect with blinking cursor and adjustable typing cadence.

Threads.desc: Animated pattern of lines forming fabric-like motion.

TiltedCard.desc: 3D perspective tilt card reacting to pointer.

TrueFocus.desc: Dynamic blur/clarity applied over words in sequence.

VariableProximity.desc: Letter styling changes continuously with pointer distance mapping.

Waves.desc: Layered lines forming smooth wave patterns with animation.

hero-1.desc: Clean two-column hero with CTA and social proof.

hero-2.desc: Curved bento grid hero with cursor following effect.

hero-3.desc: Rounded WebGL gradient shader with cursor interaction.

hero-5.desc: Gradient background with floating orbs and cursor parallax.

hero-6.desc: Auto-rotating carousel with vertical progress line and slide transitions.

hero-7.desc: 3D rotating image carousel with pink glow bar and particles.

hero-8.desc: Large typography with expandable media tiles between text.

hero-9.desc: Full-screen video background with blur text reveal animation.

hero-10.desc: Centered text with three stacked card elements.

hero-12.desc: Background image with curved shape text overlays.

hero-13.desc: Clean hero with glow separator and floating icons.

features-1.desc: 8-item grid with bordered icons and descriptions.

features-2.desc: Two-column layout with auto-cycling carousel and animated glass overlay cards.

features-3.desc: Grid with opposite-scrolling vertical marquees and gradient fades.

features-4.desc: Auto-cycling tabbed interface with smooth transitions and feature lists.

features-5.desc: 6-card grid with icons, CTAs, and dashed fade background.

social-proof-1.desc: Simple logo grid with bordered cells and hover effects.

social-proof-2.desc: Customer showcase with dual opposite-scrolling marquees and gradient fades.

social-proof-3.desc: Bento-style testimonial grid with backdrop blur cards and gradient background.

social-proof-4.desc: Wall of love with 3-column scrolling marquee and glass-bordered testimonial cards.

social-proof-5.desc: Auto-cycling testimonials with avatar carousel and circular progress indicators.

social-proof-6.desc: Vertical logo carousel with glass overlay and gradient.

social-proof-7.desc: Full-width video player with description and logo marquee.

social-proof-8.desc: Testimonial slider with progress indicators and floating button.

social-proof-9.desc: Minimal dual opposite-scrolling marquees with gradient fades.

contact-1.desc: Three-card grid layout with pill badges and call-to-action links.

contact-2.desc: Two-column layout with company info and full contact form.

contact-3.desc: Simple centered layout with three square icon cards for contact methods.

contact-4.desc: Large image with glass card overlay and structured contact information.

contact-5.desc: Two-column layout with detailed contact info and auto-playing image carousel.

footer-1.desc: Four-column layout with branding, outlined link cards, and large background text.

footer-2.desc: Centered footer with curved SVG overlays, social icons, and image background.

footer-3.desc: Full-width CTA button with yellow hover, description, two-column links.

footer-4.desc: Bold headline, newsletter signup with email input, four-column links.

footer-5.desc: Card footer with staggered fade background.

footer-6.desc: Two row footer with categories and large links.

comparison-1.desc: Two-column layout with brand logos, checkmark feature comparison, and CTA.

comparison-2.desc: Pricing comparison table with plan toggle, colored border highlight.

comparison-3.desc: Visual bar chart comparison with animated rising bars and G2 scores.

navigation-1.desc: Classic top nav with dropdown menus and mobile overlay.

navigation-2.desc: Centered rounded nav with glass effect and expanding card dropdowns.

navigation-3.desc: Logo left, grouped center links, auth buttons right with mobile menu.

navigation-4.desc: Vertical side nav with dock-style hover scaling and tooltips.

navigation-5.desc: Fixed bottom nav that expands upward with full menu and social links.

navigation-6.desc: Responsive top nav with full screen menu and image preview.

navigation-7.desc: Top nav with rounded items and dropdown menus.

navigation-8.desc: Bottom nav with blurred background and image previews.

auth-1.desc: Split layout with sign-in form and animated testimonial marquee.

auth-2.desc: Split layout with gradient background, OAuth buttons, and sign-in form.

auth-3.desc: Centered card with OAuth options and floating brand section over background.

cta-1.desc: Centered sign-up form with cursor-parallax floating background cards.

cta-2.desc: Full-screen centered CTA with GSAP-powered cursor trail image effect.

cta-3.desc: DevOps deployment CTA with animated rotating SVG circles and 3D card.

cta-4.desc: Centered CTA with infinitely scrolling cards.

cta-5.desc: Rounded video mask with CTA content below.

faq-1.desc: Classic two-column FAQ with sticky title and animated accordion.

faq-3.desc: Multi-category tabbed FAQ with animated accordions.

pricing-1.desc: Three-tier pricing with yearly/monthly toggle and feature highlights.

pricing-2.desc: Bento-style layout with free card, dual-plan toggle, and animated prices.

pricing-3.desc: Minimal three-card layout with bold typography and simple feature lists.

pricing-4.desc: Two-section hero with large headline and detailed feature comparison cards.

pricing-6.desc: Three card layout with highlighted middle card.

stats-1.desc: Two-column layout with stacked bar chart.

stats-2.desc: Full-width stats card with circular comparison charts.

stats-3.desc: Stats section with animated marquee mask effect.

stats-4.desc: Two-column layout with 2x2 grid of stat cards.

stats-5.desc: Full-width colored card with world map background and stats grid.

stats-6.desc: Asymmetrical layout with mobile device mockups and parallax stat circles.

stats-7.desc: Two-column layout with animated bar charts.

stats-8.desc: Two-column large stats display with chart visualization.

404-1.desc: Minimalist 404 page with title and card grid.

404-2.desc: Full screen 404 text with centered layout and navigation button.

profile-1.desc: Simple profile card with avatar, bio, and action buttons.

profile-3.desc: Minimal profile card with smooth fade effect.

about-1.desc: Two-column carousel with auto-cycling images and text.

about-4.desc: Three-column layout with cycling progress circle.

about-5.desc: Infinite horizontal scroll with bento cards.

waitlist-1.desc: Waitlist signup with animated vertical marquees.

waitlist-2.desc: Centered waitlist signup with large title and fading card.

waitlist-3.desc: Rounded waitlist card with top SVG insert and image.

showcase-1.desc: Animated background showcase with four items.

showcase-2.desc: Draggable infinite horizontal carousel with 3D hover effect.

showcase-3.desc: 3D triangular carousel with drag and snap.

how-it-works-1.desc: Step-by-step carousel with images and navigation.

how-it-works-2.desc: Step cards with dimmed image background hover effect.

how-it-works-3.desc: Animated stepper with 3D perspective shifting images.

download-1.desc: Versioned download section with OS options.

download-2.desc: Download CTA with rating cards and app store options.

download-3.desc: Download CTA with description and animated shader logo.

blog-1.desc: Responsive blog page with article card grid.

blog-2.desc: Recently published section with animated pagination.

blog-3.desc: Blog section with sidebar filtering and next/prev buttons.

blog-4.desc: Article page with stats and user details.
